original_title: Anne Murray: What a Wonderful World
overview: Music & Musicals, Classic Country & Western, Country & Western/Folk, Jazz & Easy Listening, Vocal Pop - For more than 30 years, fans have followed country-pop singer Anne Murray's career on account of her catchy romantic songs crooned with her strong alto voice. Filmed before a packed house of adoring fans, this live performance of fourteen of Murray's greatest hits includes favorites such as "Amazing Grace," "Put a Little Love in Your Heart," "What a Wonderful World," "I Can See Clearly Now," "Song of Bernadette" and more.
title: Anne Murray: What a Wonderful World
